name: Inno
overview:
Vision - Ascending from information to knowledge, from knowledge to intelligence through innovation automation, universal service discovery and exploitation can make business virtualization and life virtualization happen

Mission - Provide R5 (Right service for Right people at Right place, Right time in Right way) Deal Discovery Engine and related services to make your life beyond being straightforward

Goal - Enable Business Virtualization and Life Virtualization through R5

Culture - FAST (Focus, Accelerate, Strength and Tie-up) PARTER (Passion, Accountability, Responsiveness, Team, Nimbleness, Empowerment, Relationship)

Ethics - We do business with CHILD (Care, Honesty, Integrity, Lucidness, and Dignity), CHILD is of paramount importance in our daily practice, above anything else

Core Competency - As Innovatics Pioneer, we are proud to develop and market our enabling technologies based on our vision: Business/Life Virtualization and Human/Machine Unification through formation of INformation and search but not REsearch. We win our customers through our innovative products, impeccable services based on our unparallel capability

Strength - Tiger team made up of top performers under the leadership of superstar; Established and continuously growing impressive client base; Have hands-on experience on working closely with major accounts; Understand global business, culture and legal issues, very much easy to work with

In this risky business, there is not past, no future, only present, which is a gift. We never hesitate to execute with our Global Localization and Local Globalization mindset.
